text:
Phew, good work~!
That's the end of the first half for now~!

Yeah, but we've still got a long way to go. Gotta rest up during this break──
Yuika, if you lean back any further, your obi might get crushed.

Oops...! ── Thanks, Sakuyan.
Hehe, I thought I was being careful.

It's hard to see that part on your own,
so it can't be helped.

...How do you think we should rest to
avoid messing up our outfits the most?
Maybe lying face down in a tatami room?

You're kidding, right!?
That could end up looking like a crime scene if we're not careful!

Hmm. Indeed, as a cool unit, the "Passing out in
Formal Wear Incident" might not be so cool after all.
Well, not just for cool units!
